content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is working and connected to the boiler, which is also operational.

### Copper plate factory at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) that is currently full output and processing copper-ore into iron-plate.
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) that is set to create automation-science-pack but has a shortage of ingredients (copper-plate and iron-gear-wheel).

### Pipe groups
- PipeGroup for steam (fluid system 40059) connecting the boiler and steam engine.
- PipeGroup for water (fluid system 40062) connecting the offshore pump to the boiler.

### Electricity distribution
Consists of multiple small electric poles providing power to various structures, including the lab and assembling machine.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when setting recipes for furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is placed correctly and is operational before attempting to set its recipe. Verify that the furnace exists at the specified position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
